title: Fix 'Failed to load work items' and ensure provided YouTube videos render in My Work section

requirements.text: Fix the 'Failed to load work items' error so the My Work section can display work videos reliably.

quotes: check the error why in my work section videos are not showing
its showing failed to load work items
from the aap we are building

acceptanceCriteria: When loading the portfolio page as an anonymous user, the My Work section does not show the 'Failed to load work items' state under normal conditions.
If the backend work-items query fails for any reason, the frontend still renders a non-empty fallback list (seeded/default work items) instead of showing only an error state.
The underlying error is still logged to the browser console with enough detail to debug (e.g., includes the caught error object/message).

requirements.text: Add the user-provided YouTube video links as work items under the My Work section title 'My Work' and render them as embedded videos.

quotes: i am again providing ou the link of the videos which should be added in my work section under the title my work

acceptanceCriteria: The My Work section displays embedded videos for each of these URLs: https://youtube.com/shorts/ray6GXDMXug?feature=share , https://youtube.com/shorts/v604ax9a_Xs?feature=share , https://youtube.com/shorts/MeIGa2QyRZY?feature=share , https://youtube.com/shorts/A2TwkU0DDSA?feature=share , https://youtu.be/YfkEA9G75YE .
Each work card shows the title text 'My Work' and an embedded YouTube player (iframe) for supported YouTube URLs, including Shorts links.
Clicking the external-link icon (or link) opens the original YouTube URL in a new tab.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/immutablePaths (including frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts and frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo.
nonGoals: Adding new video providers beyond the existing YouTube/Vimeo detection.
Introducing third-party auth providers or non-Internet-Computer backend services.
